channel.title: Lights - ST3R30 [Electronic]
channel.description: Another single from an upcoming album, really really happy with how it came out. Also my first song to to max out all of the instrument slots :stuck_out_tongue: Listen [here](https://soundcloud.com/thatguywhousesauxy/lights), feedback is appreciated as always.

item.title: Lights - ST3R30 [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
Intro is neat. The snappy clap/snare is nice. Vintage Electric Piano works well. I don’t usually see that type of Instrument used for what it’s supposed to be used for. WOAH that came out of nowhere. Super tight build up! Pretty chords for the drop! Real awesome drop there. The wubby disturbing lead fits nicely after the drop. Kinda wish it went on for a bit longer. Awesome song all in all!

Uniqueness: 8/10
Predictability: 7/10
Complexity: 7/10
Use of Instruments/Automation: 8/10
Feeling: 8/10

Overall: 38/50

Read full topic
